statements: SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100
SELECT route_id, start_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC
SELECT end_location, fuel_usage FROM routes WHERE fuel_usage < 10
SELECT route_id, end_location, distance_km FROM routes LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_location = ST_GeogPoint(1.0, 2.0)
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km, fuel_usage FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY fuel_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_location = ST_GeogPoint(-122.4194, 37.7749) AND end_location = ST_GeogPoint(-118.2437, 34.0522);
SELECT route_id, distance_km, fuel_usage FROM routes WHERE fuel_usage < 10 AND (start_location <-> end_location) > 50;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE ST_Distance(start_location, end_location) > 2000;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY route_id ASC, fuel_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes CROSS JOIN distances WHERE routes.route_id = distances.route_id;
SELECT route_name, ST_ASTEXT(start_location) AS start_coordinates, ST_ASTEXT(end_location) AS end_coordinates FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes JOIN distances ON routes.route_id = distances.route_id WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, ST_AsText(start_location), ST_AsText(end_location) FROM routes WHERE route_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT distance_id, distance FROM distances WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes JOIN distances ON routes.route_id = distances.route_id WHERE distance > 50 ORDER BY route_name ASC, distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 50;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE max_capacity >= 20 ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT stop_id, location, capacity FROM stops WHERE capacity < 10 ORDER BY stop_id ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, max_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE max_capacity >= 50 ORDER BY vehicle_type;
SELECT stop_id, location, capacity, demand FROM stops WHERE capacity > demand ORDER BY location;
SELECT route_id, start_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance < 50 ORDER BY start_location, distance DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE ST_DISTANCE(current_location, 'POINT(-122.334540 47.605784)') < 1000;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, vehicle_type, capacity FROM vehicles;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 50 ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, capacity FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions WHERE congestion_level > 3 AND weather_condition = 'Rainy' ORDER BY congestion_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_type, max_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT station_id, location, fuel_type, price_per_unit FROM fuel_stations ORDER BY price_per_unit DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT route_id, start_time, end_time FROM trips WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_type, max_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel' AND max_capacity > 50;
SELECT station_id, location, fuel_type, price_per_unit FROM fuel_stations ORDER BY price_per_unit ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT traffic_id, congestion_level, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND congestion_level = 'high';
